__e: Sir, I didn't mean... I am tired of all the things you didn't mean to do.
I'm 30 years older than both of them and they're the ones who are too tired to party.
I just flew in from LA, and boy, are my arms tired from hitting the person next to me.
Uh, we're all a little tired-- why don't we take a break, get some air?
It doesn't matter how hungry we are or how tired we are, we want to show up for the person that's having trouble.
We were just out, uh, boating, and, uh, you know, we, uh, we were so tired, we got lost, and we saw your light.
I know you're tired and have to be back in the home by eight.
You know, with you working so much, my parents were tired so they ~almost had no time~ for Henry.
I know how tired you all are and how much we've asked of you these past few days.
